activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11268
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan  I suspect this issue is related to Tailwind. The component works fine on smaller screen widths but breaks when the width increases, especially at md, lg, or xl breakpoints.

**Proposed Solution:**
I'll investigate and fix the issue by:
Checking if any w-full, max-w-*, or container classes are affecting responsiveness.
Ensuring md:flex, lg:grid, or other responsive utilities are correctly applied.
Debugging overflow-hidden, min-w-0, flex-wrap, and gap-* to prevent layout shifts.

**ETA:** 14 March
